category.label: InformQString

content.div:
From the runways to the streets, taking the season's hottest trends from stick-thin models can be a daunting task. With the help of fashion writer and stylist Chantel “Pinkie” Bedward, we're letting you know how to incorporate the top five trends for spring/summer 2012 into your daily real-life runway.

Floral Prints

"Spring/summer 2012 is all about being BOLD with large blooms," says Bedward. "The new floral isn’t about being soft and pretty; it is about saying 'I’m here!'"

For those gals looking to blossom this season, go big or go home. "Floral prints make us feel pretty," explains Bedward. "Florals in bright prints and colour, head to toe… forget a shirt, we are talking about an entire outfit!"

Tip: If you haven’t worked up to an entire floral pant suit, try a bold floral dress paired with solid accessories (belt, shoes, purse or gloves).

Tribal Prints

Florals aren't the only bold, in-your-face prints trending for spring 2012. Rich tribal prints have been showing up everywhere on the runways, from New York to Milan. Designers such as Donna Karan, Michael Kors and BCBG have all included these iconic bold prints in feel-good earth tones for spring 2012.

"It’s all about rich tribal patterns and ethnic shapes,” says Bedward of the upcoming season. "Texture is always important in tribal. Try mixing it up a bit with wood, metallics and beaded items for real depth."

Not all prints are the same, warns Bedward. "Remember to keep a simple shape in mind and add a splash of colourful ethnic and animal patterns or prints," advises Bedward. "For a bolder look, try mixing animal patterns and ethnic prints for a bold tribal trend."

"Don’t forget to take inspiration from around the world and don’t get stuck in Africa," she adds

Tip: To warm yourself up to the look, try it first with accessories. Wooden rings and bangles are a perfect place to start.

1920's

It's the return of feminity; from floral patterns to elegant silhouettes, this season is all about playing up your feminine features. The runways have been littered with flapper-inspired pieces, complete with fringed embellishments and drop waists. "Floating silhouettes with floor length skirts, silk taffeta and layers galore marks the return of femininity," announces Bedward.

Tip: A tulle or organza full-length body hugging skirt paired with a simple tee is the perfect way to bring this look home.

Sweet Sorbet

"Sweet sorbet is here to stay!" says Bedward and she isn't talking about the delicious frozen treat. Colour is an essential part of spring/summer, so it's no surprise that hues that tickle our taste buds are also popping up in some of the must-have items of the season.

"Spring/summer 2012 is about light bright, neon and tropical hues, which are coming through as the essential colour palette," says Bedward.

Tip: Pair a simple white tee with a rainbow colour pant or skirt for any effortless look or brighten your day with a neon accessory like a satchel.

Summer Leather

Leather is one trend that doesn't seem to be going away, which is why we're beyond excited that we'll get another season out of our hot leather shorts. "Who say we can’t wear leather in summer?" declares Bedward. "Spring/summer 2012 leather trends are inspired colorful. Look for ethnic influences, nostalgia and heritage classics, as well as simple shapes with a natural vibe."

"The perfect summer leather garments are short shorts/skirts, mini-dresses and my personal fave -- a vest."

Worried about hurting your pocketbook before heading out on that perfect summer getaway? No worry, says Bedward. "For the average gal out there, there are killer 'leatherette' pieces at H&M; no one can tell the difference!"

Tip: Throw a leather vest over just about anything and it works.

The runway looks may look daunting from the comfort of your computer (hey, not everyone can be a size 4!) but that shouldn't keep you from having fun and staying in style this season. "Remember trends are meant to be embraced, so make them your own!" advises Bedward.

source.title: Looking Forward: Top Trends of Spring 2012
source.subtitle: Check out the top five trends for spring/summer 2012. Learn how to work these bold prints and flatter silhouettes into your wardrobe next season.

link.Abstract: American designer Ralph Lauren has built a global lifestyle brand over the past 40 years. Check out images from the runway at New York Fashion Week featuring the Ralph Lauren Spring 2012 collection.
link.title: Photos: Ralph Lauren -- New York Fashion Week Spring 2012

link.Abstract: Designers Kate and Laura Mulleavy of Rodarte have a celebrity fanbase that includes actresses Natalie Portman, Cate Blanchett and Keira Knightley. Check out images from the runway at New York Fashion Week featuring the Rodarte Spring 2012 collection.
link.title: Photos: Rodarte -- New York Fashion Week Spring 2012

link.Abstract: Designer Michael Kors has been designing classic American sportswear for women under his collection label since 1981 and men since 2002. Check out images from the runway at New York Fashion Week featuring the Michael Kors Spring 2012 collection.
link.title: Photos: Michael Kors -- New York Fashion Week Spring 2012

link.Abstract: Mark Badgley and James Mischka design pieces that have been worn by the likes of Kate Winslet, Helen Mirren and Sarah Jessica Parker. Check out images from the runway at New York Fashion Week featuring the Badgley Mischka Spring 2012 collection.
link.title: Photos: Badgley Mischka -- New York Fashion Week Spring 2012

link.Abstract: Check out images from Victoria Beckham's Spring 2012 presentation during New York Fashion Week on September 11, 2011 in New York City.

link.Abstract: Check out images from the runway at New York Fashion Week featuring the Vera Wang Spring 2012 collection.
link.title: Photos: Vera Wang -- New York Fashion Week Spring 2012

link.title: Photos: BCBGMAXAZRIA -- New York Fashion Week Spring 2012

link.Abstract: Check out images from Gwen Stefani's L.A.M.B. Spring 2012 presentation during New York Fashion Week on September 11, 2011 in New York City.
link.title: Photos: L.A.M.B. -- New York Fashion Week Spring 2012

link.Abstract: Host Heidi Klum, mentor Tim Gunn and judges Michael Kors and Nina Garcia along with guest designer and celebrity judges watch Project Runway contestants show at New York Fashion Week at The Theater at Lincoln Center on September 9, 2011 in New York City.

entry.title: Photos: Tommy Hilfiger -- New York Fashion Week Spring 2012

link.Abstract: Principal designer of the Tommy Hilfiger Group, Tommy Hilfiger, has been designing American-inspired apparel and accessories for the past 25 years. Check out images from the runway at New York Fashion Week featuring the Tommy Hilfiger Spring 2012 collection.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: Models walk the runway at the Tommy Hilfiger Spring 2012 fashion show during New York Fashion Week at The Theater at Lincoln Center on September 11, 2011 in New York City.
link.title: Tommy Hilfiger Spring 2012

link.Abstract: Can you believe what we caught stars wearing this week? Rate the latest celebrity styles.

entry.title: Photos: Project Runway -- New York Fashion Week Spring 2012

link.Abstract: Host Heidi Klum, mentor Tim Gunn and judges Michael Kors and Nina Garcia along with guest designer and celebrity judges watch Project Runway contestants show at New York Fashion Week at The Theater at Lincoln Center on September 9, 2011 in New York City.
